typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	param_FileSystem as string ("container-adf-nido-prod-eastau-100-1"),
	param_ErrorRowDirectory as string ("ErrorRows")
}
source(output(
		PipelineName as string,
		PipelineRunId as string,
		PipelineTriggerTime as string,
		QueryFinishDate as date,
		QueryStartDate as date,
		approvalStatus as string,
		centreCostCode as string,
		date as string,
		employee as string,
		employeeId as string,
		{employeeRef.No} as integer,
		employmentType as string,
		end as string,
		leaveApplicationId as string,
		room as string,
		roomCostCode as string,
		roster as string,
		rosterId as string,
		start as string,
		timesheetId as string,
		totalCost as double,
		totalHours as double,
		workType as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> sourceJson
sourceJson derive(each(match(not(typeMatch(type,'datetime'))&&not(like(name,'%timesheet%'))&&(like(name,'%date%')||like(name,'%Date%')||like(name,'%Time%')||like(name,'%time%'))), $$ = toTimestamp(toString($$), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time')),
		start = toTimestamp(concat(toString(toDate(date)), ' ', start, ':00')),
		end = toTimestamp(concat(toString(toDate(date)), ' ', end, ':00'))) ~> castDateColumns
castDateColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_fileSystem: ($param_FileSystem),
	rejectedData_folderPath: ($param_ErrorRowDirectory),
	transactionCommit: 'batch',
	reportSuccessOnError: true) ~> sinkSql

parameters{
	param_FileSystem as string ("container-adf-nido-prod-eastau-100-1"),
	param_ErrorRowDirectory as string ("ErrorRows")
}
source(output(
		{Org.LegalName} as string,
		{Org.OrganizationId} as string,
		{PayRun.PayRunId} as string,
		{PayRun.PayslipGenerationStatus} as string,
		PipelineName as string,
		PipelineRunId as string,
		PipelineTriggerTime as string,
		baseRate as double,
		departmentCode as string,
		employeeId as string,
		employmentTypeCode as string,
		employmentTypeCodeDesc as string,
		firstName as string,
		{hoursOrA/DCode} as integer,
		{hoursOrA/DCodeDesc} as string,
		idNumber as integer,
		level1Code as string,
		level2Code as string,
		lineItemId as integer,
		numberOfUnits as double,
		payDate as string,
		payMethodCode as string,
		payMethodCodeDesc as string,
		payslipId as string,
		payslipNumber as string,
		periodEndingDate as string,
		periodStartDate as string,
		positionTitle as string,
		projectCode as string,
		rate as double,
		surname as string,
		value as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> sourceJson
sourceJson derive(each(match(not(typeMatch(type,'datetime'))&&(like(name,'%date%')||like(name,'%Date%')||like(name,'%Time%')||like(name,'%time%'))), $$ = toTimestamp(toString($$), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time'))) ~> castDateColumns
castDateColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_fileSystem: ($param_FileSystem),
	rejectedData_folderPath: ($param_ErrorRowDirectory),
	transactionCommit: 'batch',
	reportSuccessOnError: true) ~> sinkSql

source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) as PreRowCount from definitiv.Employees
select count(*) as PostRowCount from definitiv.Employees
SELECT [employeeId] FROM [definitiv].[Employees]
select count(*) as PreRowCount from definitiv.EmployeesEmploymentHistory
select count(*) as PostRowCount from definitiv.EmployeesEmploymentHistory
select count(*) as PreRowCount from definitiv.Organizations
select count(*) as PostRowCount from definitiv.Organizations
select [Org.OrganizationId] as orgId, [payRunId], [Org.LegalName] as orgLegalName, [payslipGenerationStatus] from definitiv.OrganizationPayRuns where [payslipGenerationStatus] = 'Complete'
select count(*) as PreRowCount from definitiv.CustomReportPayslips
select count(*) as PostRowCount from definitiv.CustomReportPayslips
select organizationId from definitiv.Organizations
select count(*) as PreRowCount from definitiv.ReportingLeaveApplications
select count(*) as PostRowCount from definitiv.ReportingLeaveApplications
select organizationId from definitiv.Organizations
select count(*) as PreRowCount from definitiv.ReportingLeaveBalances
select count(*) as PostRowCount from definitiv.ReportingLeaveBalances
select count(*) as PreRowCount from definitiv.CustomReportRosters
select count(*) as PostRowCount from definitiv.CustomReportRosters
select count(*) as PreRowCount from definitiv.CustomReportTimesheets
select count(*) as PostRowCount from definitiv.CustomReportTimesheets
select count(*) as PreRowCount from definitiv.CustomReportWages
select count(*) as PostRowCount from definitiv.CustomReportWages
select organizationId, legalName from definitiv.Organizations
select count(*) as PreRowCount from definitiv.OrganizationPayRuns
select count(*) as PostRowCount from definitiv.OrganizationPayRuns
